name: Morondanga Republik: Cirilo Sansebiera
description:
Cirilo Sansebiera was a poet of the post-revolutionary era. He founded the Effervescent Sentimentalism, an avant-garde poetic movement that spoke out against rhymed poetry and promoted the values of syllable-poor verse.
He disappeared in the 1970s without a trace. 
Many poets organized searches to find him. Some of them because Cirilo owed them money.
His cat, Elmer, has a statue of his own in the center of the city.
